personal.name: Pratham Patil
personal.title: AI & ML Engineer
personal.bio: I engineer intelligent solutions at the intersection of AI and modern application development. From creating platforms for intelligent agents to visualizing complex datasets, I transform raw data into impactful digital experiences.
personal.closingBio: Ready to collaborate on something extraordinary? I'm always excited to connect with fellow innovators, explore cutting-edge projects, and push the boundaries of what's possible with technology. Let's build the future together.
story: My journey into the world of technology is rooted in a deep fascination with Artificial Intelligence. As a final-year engineering student specializing in AI & Machine Learning, I've moved beyond theory to actively build and deploy intelligent systems. Through hands-on projects and a dynamic internship experience, I've had the privilege of translating complex concepts into real-world applications, from full-stack development to data visualization.

My driving principle is to use AI not just as a tool, but as a partner in problem-solving. Whether it's architecting platforms that empower other developers or building analytics dashboards to demystify complex data, my goal is always the same: to create solutions that are intuitive, intelligent, and impactful. I'm driven by the belief that the best technology enhances human capability and brings clarity to chaos.

Fueled by a passion for technology, I constantly find myself tinkering with new AI projects. As a firm believer in continuous learning, I'm excited to connect with others in Pune's vibrant tech scene to build what's next.

experience.title: Web Development Intern
experience.description: A dynamic role focused on front-end development and agile project delivery. Engineered and styled critical, user-facing sections for a live client project, translating high-fidelity Figma designs into pixel-perfect, responsive components. Integrated seamlessly within a dynamic Agile framework, participating in daily stand-ups and rigorous code reviews to ensure rapid development and high-quality deliverables.
achievements: Developed and delivered key front-end modules for a live client website, including the navigation, hero, and user settings sections.
Translated high-fidelity Figma mockups into fully responsive, production-ready code using React.js and Tailwind CSS.
Actively contributed to a high-velocity Agile team, improving code quality through peer code reviews and collaborative problem-solving.
Mastered modern development workflows, utilizing Git and GitHub for version control, branching, and team collaboration.

education.degree: BE in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
education.institution: P.E.S Modern College of Engineering, Pune

projects.title: RetrieveX
projects.subtitle: Intelligent Retrieval System (RAG)
projects.description: An intelligent retrieval system enabling users to ask complex questions in natural language and receive accurate, source-cited answers from a private financial knowledge base.
projects.longDescription: A finalist project for the HackRx 6.0 hackathon by Bajaj Finserv. This RAG platform was built to query vast financial documents using natural language, leveraging Langchain and Vector Databases to deliver instant, verifiable answers. The system is served via a FastAPI backend and deployed on GCP.

projects.title: HR Analytics Dashboard
projects.subtitle: Business Intelligence Dashboard
projects.description: An interactive Tableau dashboard designed to transform raw HR data into actionable insights on employee attrition, performance, and workforce trends.
projects.longDescription: A data visualization project focused on business intelligence. This dashboard analyzes a complex HR dataset to identify key trends and pain points, providing a clear, interactive tool for strategic decision-making.

projects.title: Walmart Sales Analysis
projects.subtitle: SQL Data Exploration Project
projects.description: A comprehensive SQL-based analysis of the Walmart sales dataset to uncover insights on product performance, customer behavior, and branch-level profitability.
projects.longDescription: This project involved an in-depth exploration of a real-world sales dataset using advanced SQL queries. I focused on feature engineering to create new time-based columns, followed by rigorous analysis to answer key business questions related to top-performing products, sales trends over time, and customer purchasing habits across different branches.

projects.title: CodeNarrator
projects.subtitle: AI-Powered Codebase Explainer
projects.description: An ambitious project concept to create an autonomous AI agent that analyzes GitHub repositories and automatically generates narrated, YouTube-style video tutorials.
projects.longDescription: Slated as my final-year engineering project, CodeNarrator will tackle the difficult problem of developer onboarding. The plan is to use a sophisticated multi-agent system with LangGraph to parse code, generate coherent scripts, create visuals like flowcharts, and render a final video with a text-to-speech voiceover. The goal is to turn complex codebases into easy-to-understand narrated stories.

projects.title: Car Theft Detection System
projects.subtitle: Automated Parking Security
projects.description: Automated vehicle theft detection system for parking facilities using computer vision and barcode scanning technology.
projects.longDescription: Python-based security system that detects vehicle theft in real-time using moving object detection, Frame differencing techniques and barcode scanning for parking entry validation. Notifies security personnel about unauthorized vehicle movements with automated monitoring.

projects.title: ContentForge
projects.subtitle: AI Content Creation Ecosystem
projects.description: An autonomous multi-agent system where specialized AI agents collaborate to research, write, edit, and optimize high-quality written content from a single prompt.
projects.longDescription: This project is a concept for an advanced content automation pipeline. It uses LangGraph to orchestrate a team of specialized agentsâ€”including a Researcher, Writer, Editor, and SEO Optimizerâ€”that work sequentially to produce polished, fact-checked, and search-engine-optimized articles. The goal is to build a 'digital content team' powered by LLMs.

publications.title: Multi-Agent Role Specialization in Large Language Models: An Efficient Coordination Framework
publications.description: Research on multimodal AI systems for accessibility enhancement

seo.title: Pratham Patil - Generative AI Engineer & Machine Learning Engineer
seo.description: Associate Software Engineer at Lowe's specializing in AI-driven automation, Full-Stack development and accessibility technology. Expert in Python, React.js, and cloud technologies.
